title: Robust Full-Stack TypeScript/Node.js Developer
job_overview:
We’re a bootstrapped startup looking for a robust, senior full-stack developer to join us long-term.

You must be highly skilled in:

Node.js + TypeScript

React (mandatory)

PostgreSQL / Supabase

API integrations (REST, GraphQL, OAuth, Webhooks)

We run on Upgrade to see actual info, we move fast, and we need someone who can help us stabilize, optimize, and improve our current system – while also building new scalable features.

???? What You’ll Actually Do:
Dive straight into a live codebase

Problem-solve daily – figure things out, not wait for instructions

Debug existing flows, find root causes, and improve them

Talk directly with the founder (tech background)

Ship fixes fast, document clearly, and own your work

Work from Trello tickets and contribute ideas proactively

? Must-Have Skills:
React (mandatory)

Node.js & TypeScript (advanced)

PostgreSQL / Supabase

API integrations – REST, GraphQL, Webhooks, OAuth

Experience with system architecture and refactoring

Strong English (written)

Timezone: You must work full overlap with GMT+3 (Cyprus time) – wherever you live

???? You Are:
A true problem solver – you like digging into issues and fixing them

Self-managed – you deliver without babysitting

Comfortable in a fast-paced, startup environment

Not afraid to ask questions or challenge poor logic

???? Compensation:
$2/hour

Full-time (~$640/month)

Fixed budget, non-negotiable

We're a startup – this is not our max budget, but it is the rate for this role right now.

???? Do NOT Apply If:
You’re juggling multiple clients

You need someone to explain every step

You don’t test your own code or clean up after yourself

???? To Apply:
Send:

Short intro (1–2 lines)

GitHub or portfolio link

Most complex backend system or integration you've worked on

Your availability (hours/week)

Your timezone and confirmation that you can work fully in GMT+3
